Header: Court order preventing protests in Hulftsdorp
Content: A court order has been issued preventing protests, meetings and processions from today to the 10th of this month in Hulftsdorp Magistrate court area. The court order has been issued on the convener of the Sinhala Jathika Bala Muluwa, venerable Medille Pagnnaloka thera, convener of the Raawana Balaya, venerable Ittekande Saddhatissa thera and on a group of people. The order is also effective on the public who would attend protests and processions.
